title: Frontend Developer
description: Builds the user-facing part of websites and web applications. You seem to have a knack for the technologies they use.

title: Product Manager
description: Guides the success of a product and leads the cross-functional team that is responsible for improving it. Your skills align well with this role.

title: UX/UI Designer
description: Creates user-friendly interfaces that enable users to understand how to use complex technical products. Your design and user-centric skills are a great fit.

title: Data Analyst
description: Collects, cleans, and interprets data sets in order to answer a question or solve a problem. Your analytical skills are pointing in this direction.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Works on both the front-end and back-end of an application. You have a solid mix of skills for this versatile role.
